img_summary: The image shows a rectangular stone or artifact with intricate carvings. The carvings include a series of red symbols or characters arranged vertically and horizontally, possibly resembling ancient script or a seal. The stone has a weathered appearance, suggesting age, and there are additional smaller characters or inscriptions along the right edge. The background is dark, highlighting the artifact's details.
